title: pdf
body: stop hijacking PDFs with your terrible Edge app. I don't use Edge as my browser, but when I select open with Adobe, and set the default app to Adobe, Edge overrides it every time. Terrible. Adobe reader is great and Edge is very weak. please please stop it. it is the biggest flaw with Windows 10 (even worse than the games and bloatware)

comments.body: This is part of the reason I do not think I will ever use Edge as my primary browser. Microsoft continues to act that software that is effectively beta ware as being better than better than fully functional desktop applications. No browser Add-in or App designed for cell phones is better than a desktop application.
